name: DateHelpers
summary: Swift extension adding some handy methods to NSDate
description:
This extension will add this methods to NSDate:

                   * beginningOfDate()->NSDate
Returns an NSDate for the same day at 0 hours, 0 minutes and 0 seconds
                   * endOfDate()->NSDate
Returns an NSDate for the same day at 23 hours, 59 minutes and 59 seconds
* IsToday()->Bool
Return true if Date is the same day as current NSDate
